content: Last week in Afghanistan 315 Afghans were reported killed and 62 were wounded in more than 12 bombing and shooting incidents. 8 militants were reported arrested. 4 allied personnel including 2 Americans were reported wounded and 4 Brits were killed in skirmishes with Taliban forces. The USAF reported that coalition air forces flew 426 tacair missions over Afghanistan. It was also reported that April was the high point to date in the number of bombs dropped on Afghanistan - 436 in 2 110 sorties. This message has been edited. Last edited by: popsiq, Tue 12 May 2009 08:29 PM

title: Afghanistan Update
